name: Amazoness
author: laminatestasis
notes: Dheroes through Play while I grinded for Princess, then Amazoness through to KoG. Pretty easy climb this month, only 35 wins. Beat 4 Sylvan's and Relinquished during the KoG run. Sangan is definitely just a fun tech choice. Capable of some solid plays, but don't know if it fits for sure. Getting to send it from field to leave with Princess though feels brutal in the mirror.
